---
title: "Frontend UI library for the CORI Data API"
---

::: {.callout-tip}
_Note: This README file is generated from `README.qmd` in the "R" directory of this repo with the command `npm run render:readme`._
:::

This is a set of components, contexts, and general functions for any web application that is intended to interact with the [CORI Data API](https://cori-data-api.ruralinnovation.us/){.external target="_blank"} backend (including GraphQL, Rest, and S3 resources).

### Installation

```bash
npm install --save git+https://github.com/ruralinnovation/cori.data.api
```
